cases.title: Radiology Expert Witness Allowed to Testify on Appeal
cases.description: Defendant's Radiology Expert Witness was allowed to testify in an excessive force case regarding preexisting injury.

cases.title: Vocational Rehabilitation Expert's Testimony Limited
cases.description: The court ruled plaintiff's Vocational Evaluation & Rehabilitation Expert Witness could not testify regarding brain injuries.

cases.title: Aviation Expert Witness Excluded from Testifying
cases.description: Plaintiff's Aviation Expert Witness was excluded from testifying on defendant's duty to properly store an aircraft.
